wikipedia_page.main: Kenneth Hurst Thompson (24 April 1926 – February 2008) was an English professional footballer who played as a full-back in the Football League for Gateshead and York City, and was on the books of Middlesbrough without making a league appearance.

response: Kenneth, or Ken Thompson, or Kenny Thompson may refer to:
*G. Kennedy Thompson (born 1950), also known as Ken Thompson, American businessman; Wachovia Corporation
